item.title: Rezbilt 389 1.50 ATS
item.description:
Rezbilt 389 1.50 ATS

Update: 27 May – Fixed exterior Interior and mudflap textures. – Updated for 1.50

Description: This is an SCS Peterbilt 389 that I have modified, I call it the Rezbilt 389. All of the modded parts on this truck was created using blender. None of them was taken from any other trucks. Most of them were modeled from many of them in the game and from real life trucks.

Includes: – 4 Cabins – 24 Chassis – CAT, ISX, Paccar, Cummins Engines – Many interiors variants – 10,13,18 & Allison + retarder – Lots of customizations for interior & exterior and more.


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: K-DOG’s Diamond Mines v1.50.2 ATS
item.description:
K-DOG’s Diamond Mines v1.50.2 ATS

v1.50.2 Fixed break in the road going north of Sidney Mt. to Regina when using C2C. Adds slippery, snowy roads in Canada along with ice lake crossings and a connection to Alaska North to the Future [ANTTF, Included]. The version of ANTTF included has been modified and does NOT contain updates that are available in the newest version of Alaska North to the Future. The version of ANTTF included is required for the Diamond Mines map to work. The version of ANTTF included is the ONLY version of ANTTF that will work with the Diamond Mines map. The Diamond Mines map will NOT work without the version of ANTTS that is included. ProMods Canada is compatible, eastern Canada Maps are compatible. All other Canada maps will NOT WORK. All other map mods should be compatible. I use C2C and Seirra Nevada and they are proven compatible.

All DLC required.

Load Order: 1. all other mods and maps mods in their respective load order. 2. K-DOG’s Diamond Mines v1.50.1 3. Alaska North to the Future [Included Version] [This will be the bottom of the mod manager.]


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: TGMN NTTF RC v1.0 1.50 ATS
item.description:
TGMN NTTF RC v1.0 1.50 ATS

The Great Mid-North Connection directly to NTTF no more requirement for promods Requires Coast 2 Coast and TGM to function properly.

ALL DLC’s are always required because this map, connects to those!!! Compatibility update for 1.50

item.title: MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch v1.8.5 ATS
item.description:
MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch v1.8.5 ATS

Changelog 1.8.5 – Added missing crash barrier on the right on I-5 North leaving Los Angeles – Mod file has been repacked using the new SCS Game Archive Packer to potentially optimize performance

Reforma Map and either Minor or Lite Urban Overhaul are required.

Load order: MUO/SN Compatibility Patch (optional) (ATS 1.47 and newer) MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch Reforma Sierra Nevada Legacy (optional) (ATS 1.47 and newer) Reforma map file Mega Resources (ATS 1.43 and newer) Either Minor Urban Overhaul or Lite Urban Overhaul

Supported Game Versions: 1.50


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: SCS Map Improvements v1.50 ATS
item.description:
SCS Map Improvements v1.50 ATS

Montpelier McCammon This mod aims to upgrade scenery cities and also existing cities. With functional companies, parking spots, petrol stations etc. Current Content:

Washington: Dayton Waitsburg Wallula

Idaho: Montpelier McCammon

Compatiblity: Should work with any other mod except the map mod “ATS Expansion” (idk why) Just place my mod above all others


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
